units.title: Data Structures (Low-level implementation)
topics: Various Trees: Binary, Binary Search, AVL, Splay, Heaps, 2-4 Trees, etc.
Hash Maps/Tables: External Chaining and Probing

units.title: Common Algorithms
topics: Sorting Algorithms: Bubble, Insertion, Selection, Cocktail Shaker, Merge, Quick, Radix, etc.
Pattern Matching Algorithms: Brute force, Boyer-Moore, KMP, Rabin-Karp
Graph Algorithms: Dijkstra’s Shortest Path and multiple MSTs

practice_problems: What is the tightest Big-O bound for adding to the middle index of an ArrayList? Assume an optimal implementation and do not use amortized analysis. Options: O(1), O(log n), O(n), O(n log n), O(n^2).

What is the tightest Big-O bound for adding to the back of a CircularSinglyLinkedList? Assume an optimal implementation and do not use amortized analysis. Options: O(1), O(log n), O(n), O(n log n), O(n^2).

What is the tightest Big-O bound for adding to the third-to-last spot in a DoublyLinkedList? Assume an optimal implementation and do not use amortized analysis. Options: O(1), O(log n), O(n), O(n log n), O(n^2).
What is the tightest Big-O bound for the average case of adding an element that is larger than every other data in a BST?
